mapper.insert: insert into company_info (id, phone, username, password, company_name, role, position_category, email, position_type) values (#{id}, #{phone}, #{username}, #{password}, #{companyName}, #{role}, #{positionCategory}, #{positionType, #{email}, #{positionType});
mapper.update: update company_admin set username = #{username}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, password = #{password}, position_category = #{positionCategory}, position_type =#{positionType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select * from company_admin
username like concat('%', #{username} ,'%')
phone like concat('%', #{phone} ,'%')
position_category like concat('%', #{positionCategory} ,'%')
position_type like concat('%', #{positionType} ,'%')
order by id desc
